Plot: Yonkers' Mayor Nick Wasicsko takes offices in 1987 and has to deal with the serious subject of the building of public housing in the white, middle class side of the town.
Title: Show Me a Hero
Actors: Oscar Isaac, Peter Riegert, Natalie Paul, Carla Quevedo
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 17 nominations.
